As the capital and largest city of Wyoming, Cheyenne offers a blend of Western heritage, outdoor adventure, and a welcoming community spirit.The city is known for its rich history, which is celebrated through various museums and landmarks. The Wyoming State Capitol, an architectural masterpiece, stands proudly in the heart of downtown Cheyenne and offers guided tours that delve into the state's political history. The Wyoming State Museum provides fascinating insights into the region's past, showcasing exhibits on Native American culture, pioneer life, and the growth of the state.Cheyenne embraces its Western roots with an annual celebration that is famous worldwide—the Cheyenne Frontier Days. This rodeo and Western festival takes place each summer and features thrilling rodeo events, parades, concerts, and other festivities that attract visitors from far and wide.Nature enthusiasts will find plenty to explore in and around Cheyenne. The nearby Medicine Bow National Forest offers opportunities for hiking, camping, and wildlife spotting, while Curt Gowdy State Park provides a picturesque setting for boating, fishing, and mountain biking. The scenic beauty of the area, with wide-open plains and majestic mountain ranges, serves as a playground for outdoor adventurers.The downtown area of Cheyenne boasts a charming mix of historic buildings, local shops, and inviting eateries. Strolling along the streets, visitors can discover boutique stores, art galleries, and restaurants serving up Western cuisine and hearty comfort food.Cheyenne's friendly and close-knit community fosters a welcoming atmosphere. Residents take pride in their city's heritage and actively participate in events and festivals. The Cheyenne Depot Museum, located in a beautifully restored historic train depot, is a gathering place for locals and visitors alike, hosting exhibits, concerts, and community events.In conclusion, Cheyenne, Wyoming, offers a blend of history, Western charm, and outdoor adventure. Beyourself. Do not impersonate another person or misrepresent your affiliationwith a person or organization.

SUPPORTINFO: If you need help or have any questions, send us an email and we will respond to you promptly
SHOWINDISCOVERINFO: Would you like to be showed on 'Around me'? This way, members can see how close you are. You can change it at any time in the settings.
DISCOVER_PREMIUM_DESCRIPTION: 'Around Me' is only available for Gold, VIP, Phantom, and Celebrity members. Upgrade now and discover people nearby!
BOOSTINFO: Here you can automatically preset the boost at an interval.
NEXTBOOSTIS: The next automatic boost occurs at
INSTANTBOOSTINFO: You can also get your profile to position 1 with an instant boost.
EXPLANTATION01SUBTITLE:
Registration is very easy and can be completed in less than a minute.
Register with your email address and choose a password or use your Facebook, Google or Apple account.

Choose your username. Enter your date of birth. Enter your gender and upload a profile picture of yourself.

Let us know who you would like to meet here on Desires. Choose between men, women or transsexuals. You can also select multiple. Finally, tell us where you live.

You are now in Desires and can explore your surroundings for new contacts.
EXPLANTATION02SUBTITLE:
Complete your profile so that users perceive and contact you better. In the first step, you upload images to the public galleries that all users can see and private images to the private galleries. Only VIP users and users that you have approved can see these.

In the 2nd step you give details about yourself. You choose from different categories where you would like to be listed. You indicate your ethnicity and nationality. Tell users which languages you speak. If you want a different age in your profile, please specify it here.

Give your details about your appearance, such as height, breast size, eye and hair color, so that users can find you using filter functions.

In the 3rd step you can store your telephone and WhatsApp numbers. Users can easily call or write to you via a link. This information is not mandatory. You can also use the integrated chat and keep your phone number anonymous. The internal chat always notifies you when new messages arrive. If you want to show other users your Instagram or TikTok account, you can also store your account here.

Done! Your profile is now complete.
EXPLANTATION03SUBTITLE:
Would you like to top up your Coin account to boost your profile?
Payments at Desires are quick, secure and anonymous using Bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies. Your privacy is guaranteed 100% here too.

To do this, go to the settings symbol at the bottom right in Settings. Select “Buy coins” there.
Here you can now see your current balance and you can choose how many coins you want to buy. Confirm your selection.

You will now be able to pay with Bitcoin. But you can also choose an alternative cryptocurrency via 'Altcoins'. You can scan or copy the payment link, or you can open it directly in your wallet.

Make the payment and the coin amount will be credited to you.
EXPLANTATION04SUBTITLE:
Would you like to top up your Coin account to boost your profile?
You pay easily and conveniently directly via the App Store payment system and your Apple ID.

To do this, go to the settings symbol at the bottom right in Settings. Select “Buy coins” there.
Here you can now see your current balance and you can choose how many coins you want to buy. Confirm your selection.

You can now easily unlock payment in the App Store using Face ID, Touch ID or your password.

Make the payment and the coin amount will be credited to you.
EXPLANTATION05SUBTITLE:
There are 3 different profile types. The VIP and GOLD profiles are displayed first. Below that are the standard profiles. The newest profiles are always displayed at the top.

You can always see the current position of your profile. You can manually boost your profile to the first position.
Here you also have the option of using an interval to automatically push your profile. You can choose from different intervals from hourly to daily.

A boost costs 1 coin and is automatically debited from your coin account.
EXPLANTATION06SUBTITLE:
You have the option to upgrade your profile. You have two options: either a GOLD or VIP profile.

VIP profiles are the most valuable profiles. They become larger and listed in first position. VIP profiles do not need to be boosted, they are always in first place. GOLD profiles are arranged below the VIP profiles. They are therefore higher than standard profiles and are also displayed in front of them. They are also marked as GOLD.
STARTINFO:
Welcome to Desires, the social network app where adventure meets desire. Where every connection is a chance for something thrilling, something daring, something unforgettable.
Desires, brings open-minded adults together. Whether you're seeking fun, new contacts, or erotic adventures. Desires is your gateway to a world of excitement.
This app is designed with simplicity and spontaneity in mind. Browse profiles from your current location or anywhere you choose. The interface is sleek, easy to navigate, and filled with opportunities.
Stand out with Desires. Choose from VIP, GOLD, or Standard profiles. Boost your visibility and be the first to catch someone's eye. Privacy? The algorithm ensures that you are only seen by people who interest you. You also have public and private photo galleries.
Feel the pulse of your city with  'Around Me' feature. Discover who's nearby, make connections, and plan your next rendezvous.
Build your circle with contacts, manage your connections, and keep the conversation going with a intuitive chat. Push notifications ensure you never miss a beat.
Desires isn't just an app; it's a lifestyle. It's for those who embrace the bold, the beautiful, the sensual. It's for you.
Join Desires today. Unleash your desires, embrace the adventure, and become part of a community where every moment is a chance to feel alive!

If you are the copyright owner or an agent of a copyright owner and wish to file an infringement complaint about or unsubscribe from any content on this website, please contact us immediately by email at: office[at]area89media.com

If you are NOT the copyright owner (i.e. you do not own the images) but want to alert us to possible misuse of photos (i.e. you believe that we have photos online that are not of the actual advertiser or of a celebrity or famous model originate) , so please contact us in the same way.

Please include links or relevant information in your email so we can determine if the photos are being used appropriately or not. We will investigate any complaint that provides us with sufficient information. Please note, however, that we may not be able to take all requested action if we cannot determine with a high degree of certainty that the image in question is being used improperly. Therefore, the more information you provide to us via the link below, the more likely it is that we can act on the information.


All DMCA notices should be sent to the following address:

AREA 89 MEDIA LTD – office[at]area89media.com


We welcome and encourage all valid DMCA complaints. However, please note that we have also received an increasing number of fraudulent DMCA complaints. Our company has not taken legal action against those who misuse the DMCA notice and takedown policy for fraudulent purposes. However, we expressly reserve the right to bring claims in court against any company or individual who suffers damages or attorneys’ fees to our company as a result of fraudulent or abusive DMCA complaints.

AREA 89 MEDIA LTD. also reserves the right to contact anyone filing DMCA complaints to help us confirm that the complaint was filed in accordance with all applicable federal laws.

We thank you for your support in these matters.


 2. Section 2257 Release

All persons depicted on this website were 18 years of age or older at the time the images were created.

Exemption Statement – Content Produced by Operators: With respect to any visual representations appearing on this site for which the operators of this site are “Producers,” such representations are exempt from the provisions of 18 U.S.C. §2257 and 28 C.F.R. 75 because:

3. You will not constitute simulated sexually explicit activity occurring after the effective date of Title 18 U.S.C. §2257A.

LANDINGCOMMUNITYGUIDELINE:
Guidelines - Actual version 14.05.2023


Welcome to Desires. If you are honest, kind and respectful to others, you are always welcome here. If friendliness is a foreign word to you, you’d better stay away from our community. Our goal is for users to be able to express themselves freely and openly, as long as they don’t offend or harass others. Everyone has the same status here at Desires. We ask that you be considerate, think before you act, and abide by our Community Guidelines.
Our community guidelines are listed below. If you violate these guidelines, you may be banned from Desires.

The following is undesirable on Desires:


Nudity/Sexual Content

We ask that you communicate calmly, stylishly and appropriately for the public. In the public profile, please do not show any nudity, no sexually implied content and no list of your sexual desires. The private area, which can only be entered by invitation, is intended for such content. Even though Desires is an adult platform, keep your public profile clean and adult free.


Harassment

Do not engage in targeted insults or harassment of other users, nor do you encourage others to do so. This also includes the unsolicited sending of sexual content to other users. We follow up on reports of stalking, threats, bullying or intimidation and may result in your profile being blocked.


Violence and assault

We do not tolerate violent, gruesome or gory content on Desires, or actions and content that glorify or advocate violence of any kind, including threats or promotion of terrorism. Physical injury, coercion and any form of violence are strictly prohibited. Content that advocates or glorifies suicide or self-harm is also prohibited. Report such content to our team immediately.


Hate speech

Any content that promotes, advocates, or condones racism, bigotry, hatred, or violence against any person or group based on factors such as race, ethnicity, religious affiliation, disability, sex, age, national origin, sexual orientation, or gender is not allowed .


Private information

Don’t post any private information, either yours or someone else’s. This includes social security numbers, passports, passwords, financial data or secret contact information such as telephone numbers, email addresses and home/work addresses.


Forced prostitution and human trafficking

Advocating human trafficking or non-consensual sexual activity is strictly prohibited and will result in reporting and suspension of your Desires account.


Fraud

Desires has zero tolerance for fraudulent behavior of any kind. Anyone attempting to obtain other users’ private information for fraudulent or illegal activities will be banned.


Identity fraud

Be yourself! Don’t impersonate anyone else.
Do not impersonate any person or entity or misrepresent your affiliation, affiliation or association with any other person or entity.


Minors

You must be at least 18 years old to use Desires. We therefore do not allow pictures of minors. If you see a profile depicting a minor, advocating harm to minors, or depicting a minor in a sexual or suggestive manner, please report the profile immediately.


Copyright and Trademark Infringement

If you are not the author, do not post it. If your profile includes works that others have the copyright or trademark, do not show them unless you have permission to do so.


Illegal Activity

Don’t use Desires for anything illegal. If it’s illegal in real life, it’s illegal on Desires.


Inactive User Accounts

Using Desires is lifestyle and should be fun! Use Desires whenever you can. But if you don’t log in to Desires within 12 months, we can delete your account for inactivity.
TIMELINE1: Easy registration. Your account will be created in just one minute.
TIMELINE2: In 3 steps you complete your profile with your personal data. You can separate public and private images.

Privacy policy - Actual version 12.03.2024


This privacy policy governs how Desires collects, uses, maintains and discloses information collected from users (each a “User”) of Desires app and website (“Site”). This privacy policy applies to the site and to all products and services offered by Desires.

Personal identification information:

We may collect personal information from users in various ways, such as by visiting our website, registering, placing an order, subscribing to the newsletter, answering a survey, completing a form. User information can also be obtained when using our services, functions or resources or directly requested, such as your name, email address, postal address and telephone number. We will collect personally identifiable information from users only if they voluntarily submit such information to us. Users can always refuse to provide requested personally identifiable information.
We may collect non-personally identifiable information about users when they interact with our website. Non-personal identification information may include the name of the browser, the type of equipment and technical information about the users who connect to our website, such as the operating system and Internet service providers used, and other similar information.

Web browser cookies:

Our site may use “cookies” to improve the user experience. The user’s web browser places cookies on their hard drive for recording purposes and sometimes to track information about them. The user can choose to configure their browser to reject cookies or to notify them when cookies are sent. If so, be aware that some parts of the site may not function properly.

How we use information collected:

Desires collects and uses users’ personal information for the following purposes:
– Improve customer service
The information you provide helps us respond to your needs more efficiently.
– Personalise the user experience.
We may use the information together to understand how our users as a group use the services and resources offered on our website.
– To improve our website.
We may use the feedback you provide to improve our products and services.
– Process payments.
We may use the information that users provide about themselves when placing an order only to fulfil that order. We do not share this information with third parties, except to the extent necessary to provide the service.
– To run a promotion, contest, survey or other function of the site.
Send users information that they agreed to receive on topics that we believe will be of interest to them.
– To send periodic emails.
We may use the email address to send user information and updates for your purpose. It can also be used to answer your questions and / or other requests. If the user decides to subscribe to our mailing list, they will receive emails that may include company news, updates, information on related products or services, etc.
If at any time the user wishes to stop receiving future emails, we provide details and instructions to unsubscribe at the bottom of each email or, on the contrary, the user can contact us through our Site.

How we protect your information:

We adopt appropriate data collection, storage, processing and security measures to protect against unauthorised access, alteration, disclosure or destruction of your personal information, username, password, transaction information and data stored in our site. The exchange of confidential and private data between the site and its users goes through a secure SSL communication channel and is encrypted and protected with digital signatures. Our site also complies with the PCI vulnerability to create the most secure environment possible for users.

Sharing your personal information:

We do not sell, trade, or rent user personally identifiable information to others. We may share generic aggregate demographic information that is not linked to any personally identifiable information about visitors and users with our trusted business partners, affiliates, and advertisers for the aforementioned purposes.

Third party websites:

Users may find advertisements or other content on our Site that links to the sites and services of our partners, vendors, advertisers, sponsors, distributors, and other third parties. We do not control the content or links that appear on these sites and we are not responsible for the practices employed by websites linked to or from our Site. In addition, these sites or services, including their content and links, may change constantly. These sites and services may have their own privacy policies and privacy policies.
customer service. Navigation and interaction on any other website, including websites that link to our site, are subject to that website’s own terms and policies.

Changes to this privacy policy:

Desires.app has the discretion to update this privacy policy at any time. When we do, we will revise the update date at the bottom of this page. We encourage users to check this page frequently for any changes and to stay informed about how we are helping to protect the personal information we collect. You acknowledge and agree that it is your responsibility to periodically review this privacy policy and be aware of changes.

Your acceptance of these terms:

By using this site, you signify your acceptance of this policy. If you do not agree to this policy, please do not use our Site. Your continued use of the Site after the posting of changes to this policy will be deemed your acceptance of those changes.

How to get in touch with us:

If you have any questions about this privacy policy, the practices of this site, or your dealings with this site, please contact us at:

AREA 89 Media LTD. – office[at]area89media.com

Facebook pixels:

We use the Facebook pixel on our website. We have implemented a code for this on our website. Facebook Pixel is a section of JavaScript code that loads a collection of functions with which Facebook can track the actions of its users if they visit our website through Facebook Ads. For example, when you buy a product on our website, the Facebook pixel is activated and stores your actions on our website in one or more cookies. These cookies allow Facebook to compare your user data (customer data, such as IP address, user ID) with the data of your Facebook account. Then Facebook deletes this data. The data we collect is anonymous and cannot be viewed and can only be used in the context of advertising. If you yourself are a Facebook user and are logged in, a visit to our website will automatically be assigned to your Facebook user account. We only want to show our services and products to people who are really interested in them. With the help of Facebook pixels, our advertising measures can be better tailored to your wishes and interests. In this way, Facebook users (if they have allowed personalised advertising) can see appropriate advertising. Facebook also uses the collected data for analytical purposes and its own advertisements. Next, we will show you the cookies that were placed on a test page that integrates Facebook pixels. Please note that these are only sample cookies.
